item.description:
Distance:
10.19 miles

Trip Difficulty / Pace:
This is a strenuous trip, with steep and rocky sections. We will be hiking at a moderate plus pace equal to booktime or better with stops along the way to enjoy the scenery.

Time:
8 1/2 hours plus stops

Highlights:
Webster Cliffs, Mt. Webster, Mt. Jackson, Mizpah Spring Hut & Mt. Pierce

Route:
Our adventure will begin at the Webster Cliffs Trailhead off Route 302. Here we will take the Webster Cliffs Trail to Mt. Webster, Mt. Jackson, Mizpah Springs Hut and Mt. Pierce. From Mt. Pierce we will take Crawford Path back to Route 302. This route will entail a car spot.

For further information:
email me for a detailed trip report

consult the AMC White Mountain Guide.

visit http://home.earthlink...

Your response/signing up for a hike certifies that you have read, understand, and agree with the NEHAAG disclaimer.
item.name: Mt. Webster, Mt. Jackson, Mt. Pierce & Webster Cliffs (strenuous)
